name: The British Antique Dealers' Association
goal: Trade body representing the interests of the leading antique and art dealers in the United Kingdom.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Monitor the developments concerning the Artists's Resale
Monitor issues concerning international trade in works of art, including imports and exports.
Right and the collecting societies measures.
Also monitor measures relating to endangered species of flora and fauna.
